Plot: It seems Ken can't do anything right. He loses saddle blankets and breaks reins...but then comes the worst news yet: a report card so bad that he has to repeat a grade. How can you tame the dreamy mind of a boy who stares out of the window instead of taking an exam? Enter Flicka, the chestnut filly with a wild spirit. Over the course of one magical summer, both will learn the meaning of responsibility, courage, and, ultimately, friendship.
Characters: Ken McLaughlin (Flicka), Rob McLaughlin (Flicka), Nell McLaughlin (Flicka), Howard McLaughlin (Flicka), Flicka (Flicka), Gus (Flicka), Tim
Setting: United States of America, Wyoming (United States)
